# Landing Zone â€“ Online

The online landing zone is designed for **internet-facing workloads**.

---

## Purpose

This landing zone supports workloads that require public exposure while maintaining separation from internal systems.

---

## Responsibilities

- Define online-specific resource groups
- Create a spoke virtual network
- Configure subnets for public-facing services
- Apply network security controls
- Establish hub-to-spoke connectivity

---

## Intended workloads

- Public web applications
- APIs exposed to the internet
- Edge-facing services

---

## Design considerations

- This landing zone is optional
- Security posture can be enhanced over time
- WAF, firewall, and private endpoints can be added later
